thread.title: Djokovic defeats Murray to reach Shanghai Masters final
thread.title_full: Djokovic defeats Murray to reach Shanghai Masters final

title: Djokovic defeats Murray to reach Shanghai Masters final
text:
Djokovic defeats error-plagued Murray to reach final of Shanghai Masters By JUSTIN BERGMAN Associated Press   10:08   10:08   
People: 
East Asia (691) 

SHANGHAI â€” Novak Djokovic reached his 13th consecutive ATP Tour final with a 6-1, 6-3 win over Andy Murray at the Shanghai Masters on Saturday, one of his most lopsided victories ever over his rival. 
Djokovic will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in Sunday's final after the Frenchman upset Rafael Nadal 6-4, 0-6, 7-5 in the other semifinal. 
The top-seeded Djokovic broke Murray five times in the match and committed just seven unforced errors to 30 for the Scot. 
He has now won nine of his last 10 matches against Murray over the past two years. 
Djokovic will be aiming for his ninth title this season. The Serbian star has reached the final in every tournament he has played since the Qatar Open in January when he lost to Ivo Karlovic in the quarterfinals.
